tool_description: Articles about beloved King of Filth, John Waters.
name: FilthyAPI
title: FilthyAPI

api_list.name: Get Articles from Specific Source
api_list.description: This endpoint returns articles from the specified source - outmagazine, nytimes, theadvoate, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://filthyapi.p.rapidapi.com/articles/theadvocate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "filthyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://filthyapi.p.rapidapi.com/articles/{articleid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "filthyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All John Waters Articles
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the articles about John Waters from our sources
